name: SBS - A system for dynamic service blueprints
description:
Service blueprints are the most efficient tool to create detailed maps on service processes.

This design system aims to help designers to build dynamic and flexible visualisations.


Visit serviceblueprintsystem.com to find out more.


v1.1 - 21 April 2022

  • the SBS website guide is online!

  • added description for each module
  • added examples
  • fixed issues with auto layout
